creator: z.padwal17@gmail.com
text:
#Samples, Throughput and KB/Sec increases when .JTL is imported multiple times.

For eg:

I have total 10 sample when i import .jtl in summary report which is correct, but when i again import the same thing i get 20 samples , again when i import for third time it gives me 30 samples.same goes for Throughput and KB/Sec.

Regards,
Tanaji Padwal

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: This is intentional, as it allows one to load several files and get the stats for the combined set of samples.
